Statute.Title: Time Limits and Other Periods Act (COVID-19)
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Délais et autres périodes (COVID-19), Loi sur les)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2020, c. 11, s. 11, in force on assent 27.07.2020

CIF, 2024, c. 20, par. 214(1)(i) comes into force on the day on which the definition “Regulator” is added to s. 2 of the Canada-Newfoundland and Labrador Atlantic Accord Implementation Newfoundland and Labrador Act, c. C-2 of the Revised Statutes of Newfoundland and Labrador, 1990 see SI/2025-22 (02.06.2025)
